attributes.action: Grant visa-free entry into UK for all Ukrainian citizens now.
attributes.additional_details: We need to show solidarity on all fronts.
attributes.background: Ukraine is under attack. We must do everything to help people reach safety and to support our European allies who are already struggling given the amount of expected refugees.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
